title: Where are the next of kin of the supposedly executed 40,000–125,000 Tamil civilians in Sri Lanka?
content: – By Shenali Waduge – The “experts” and “authorities” must have their say and certainly their voice is far more powerful than a country as small as Sri Lanka. They are the ones that make the laws, they decide who the villains and the heroes are, they can make heroes into villains and villains…
